title: Get chagas confirmed cases — get_chagas
text: agg character. Spatial aggregation level. uf_res UF residence. regsaude_449_res regiao de saude residence. mun_res municipality residence. agg_time character. Time aggregation level. year yearly data. month monthly data. week weekly data. Defaults year. ano vector. Year case. sexo character. Sex case. Masculino males, Feminino females Ignorado unknown. idade_a numeric. Minimum age deceased, years. idade_b numeric. Maximum age deceased, years.
